newsitem.title: USA: Wyndham Hotel hires firm to explore options.
newsitem.headline: Wyndham Hotel hires firm to explore options.

text.p: Wyndham Hotel Corp said Wednesday it has hired the investment banking firm of Smith Barney to assist in its review of strategic alternatives.
The company said it is reviewing various alternatives, but that no agreement or agreement in principle has been reached on any transaction.
Earlier Wednesday, the Wall Street Journal said in its electronic edition that Patriot American Hospitality Inc was in talks to acquire Wyndham.

Wyndham said in its statement released late Wednesday that its policy is not to commen on "rumors or stock market activity. The company's review of alternatives will remain confidential unless and until a public announcement becomes appropriate.
